title: Side chair
medium: Solid beech wood (front and side rails), solid pine wood (supporting middle seat rail), solid walnut (legs), walnut and burr walnut veneer.  Upholstery materials: drop-in seat frame of plywood, webbing, modern black enameled springs, cotton wadding, jute spring cover cloth, filling, a cover cloth and the show-cover, blued metal tacks.  (The seat is a recent fabrication.)
dimensions:
Overall: 37 1/8 x 19 7/8 x 19 3/4 in. (94.3 x 50.5 x 50.2 cm)
Other: H. of seat 18 in. (45.7 cm)
repository: Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY
